  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    org.mybatis.spring.mapper.ClassPathMapperScanner(BeanDefinitionRegistry)
    Please use the ClassPathMapperScanner(BeanDefinitionRegistry, Environment).
    org.mybatis.spring.MyBatisSystemException(Throwable)
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.mybatis.spring.mapper.ClassPathMapperScanner.setMapperFactoryBean(MapperFactoryBean<?>)
    Since 2.0.1, Please use the ClassPathMapperScanner.setMapperFactoryBeanClass(Class).
    org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer.setSqlSessionFactory(SqlSessionFactory)
    Use MapperScannerConfigurer.setSqlSessionFactoryBeanName(String) instead.
    org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer.setSqlSessionTemplate(SqlSessionTemplate)
    Use MapperScannerConfigurer.setSqlSessionTemplateBeanName(String) instead
